mapper.select: select a.id, a.appoint_user_name, su.realname as appoint_real_name, a.work_type, a.plan_order_code, a.solve_status, if(a.solve_status =1,'已解决','未解决') as solve_status_name, if(a.recevice_time is null, a.assign_time, a.recevice_time) as recevice_time, a.start_time, a.end_time, a.arrive_time, a.file_path, a.fault_analysis, a.fault_phenomenon, a.maintenance_measures from fault_repair_record a LEFT JOIN sys_user su on a.appoint_user_name = su.username where a.fault_code = #{faultCode} order by a.create_time desc
